Actions.Text: REFERRED TO VETERANS, HOMELAND SECURITY AND MILITARY AFFAIRS

Votes.Committee: Veterans, Homeland Security And Military Affairs

Title: Establishes the resilient New York revolving loan program and the resilient New York revolving loan fund
Summary: Establishes the resilient New York revolving loan program and the resilient New York revolving loan fund to provide low or no-interest loans to municipalities, not-for-profit organizations, and individual property owners for hazard mitigation and resilience projects; provides funding from federal STORM Act.
LawCode: Add §29-l, Exec L; add §99-pp, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to the resilient New York revolving loan program; and to amend the state finance law, in relation to establishing the resilient New York revolving loan fund
